item.title: Weekly Journal of a 33-Year-Old Unemployed Rural Programmer's Self-Help Journey (4) - AI Efficiency, Income ¥1410
item.description: This article chronicles the self-help journey of a 33-year-old unemployed rural programmer. Through freelance projects including enterprise spreadsheet automation and Vue to React conversion, leveraging AI tools to improve work efficiency, he completed 8 orders earning ¥1410 in one week. The article shares experiences in remote freelancing, AI-assisted programming insights, and the importance of building client relationships, providing reference for programmers aspiring to freelance work.

item.title: Weekly Journal of a 33-year-old Unemployed Rural Programmer's Self-Help Journey (3) - Finding My Position
item.description: This article documents the third week of a 33-year-old unemployed rural programmer’s self-help journey. The author achieved weekly earnings over 1000 yuan through freelancing and established his position as a ’technical handyman’. The article shares failed cases in remote printing and web development, summarizes experiences in efficient communication, improving speech skills, and pricing strategies, and displays real freelancing income details. This is a valuable experience sharing for programmers who want to achieve freelance work through technical skills.
